message: With her stylish haircut and graceful demeanor, she's sure to turn heads wherever she goes. But don't let her sophisticated appearance fool you; she's also a playful pup who loves nothing more than chasing after her favorite toys.

the pint-sized Chihuahua with a big personality. Despite his small stature, he's got a heart of a lion and isn't afraid to stand up for himself. And while he may be a little stubborn at times, his unwavering loyalty and fierce devotion make him the perfect lapdog companion.
